title: admin panel takes 1 minute to load
body:
the admin panel takes a long time to load and display, a full minute in this case.  freebsd 9 with zfs and mysql.  load up owncloud with a fresh install, or any install, click on the admin panel, and count the time.

app server and db server are on the same server
mysql 5.5.21

mysql> select * from oc_appconfig;
+-------------------+-----------------------------------+------------------------------+

1 row in set (0.05 sec)
